name: Lost and Found (PurpleCatGalaxy, InterstellarAlly, purplepotat, Inane Cat)
name_original: Lost and Found (PurpleCatGalaxy, InterstellarAlly, purplepotat, Inane Cat)
description:
You work at the Lost and Found, helping people find their lost items. 

However, you've lost something important yourself. 

Will you find what you lost? 

A visual novel made in 18 days for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story Jam.

Made by 3 friends:

PurplePotato- Story, Characters

Inane Cat- Music, Backgrounds, Story

InterstellarAlly / Alex- Programming
